sqlReaderQuery.value:
DECLARE @SystemCodes VARCHAR(50) = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCodes}';
DECLARE @BatchSize INT = @{pipeline().parameters.BatchSize};
WITH
    [_SystemCodes]
    AS
    (
        SELECT DISTINCT TRIM(value) [SystemCode]
        FROM STRING_SPLIT(IIF(LEN(TRIM(@SystemCodes))=0, NULL, @SystemCodes), ',')
    ),
	ExtractLoad AS
	(
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY M.[SourceID]) / @BatchSize [Order], M.[SystemCode], M.[SourceID]
		FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] M JOIN [_SystemCodes] C ON C.[SystemCode] = M.[SystemCode]
		WHERE [Enabled] = 1
		UNION
		SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY M.[SourceID]) / @BatchSize [Order], M.[SystemCode], M.[SourceID]
		FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] M
		WHERE [Enabled] = 1 AND (SELECT COUNT(*)
		FROM [_SystemCodes]) = 0
	)
	SELECT SystemCode, MIN([SourceID]) StartSourceID, MAX([SourceID]) EndSourceID
	FROM ExtractLoad
	GROUP BY [Order], [SystemCode]
	ORDER BY [Order], MIN([SourceID])

SELECT S.BatchID, S.ID, S.LowWatermark
	,R.[SourceID]
    ,R.[SystemCode]
    ,[SourceSchema]
    ,[SourceTableName]
    ,[SourceQuery]
    ,[SourceFolderPath]
    ,[SourceFileName]
    ,[SourceKeyVaultSecret]
    ,[SourceHandler]
    ,[LoadType]
    ,[BusinessKeyColumn]
    ,[WatermarkColumn]
    ,[RawHandler]
    ,R.[RawPath]
    ,[TrustedHandler]
    ,[TrustedPath]
    ,[DestinationSchema]
    ,[DestinationTableName]
    ,[DestinationKeyVaultSecret]
    ,[ExtendedProperties]
	FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadStatus] S
	JOIN [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] R ON R.SourceID = S.SourceID
	WHERE 
	S.BatchID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchId}'
	AND S.SystemCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCode}'
	AND R.[Enabled] = 1

UPDATE U
SET [EndedDTS] = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(DATETIMEOFFSET, GETDATE()) AT TIME ZONE 'AUS Eastern Standard Time')
FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadStatus] U
WHERE BatchID = '@{pipeline().parameters.BatchId}'
AND SystemCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCode}'
SELECT 1 A

UPDATE U
SET [EndedDTS] = CONVERT(DATETIME, CONVERT(DATETIMEOFFSET, GETDATE()) AT TIME ZONE 'AUS Eastern Standard Time')
FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadStatus] U
WHERE BatchID = '@{variables('ParentBatchID')}'
AND SystemCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCode}'
SELECT 1 A

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
CONCAT([CreateSchema], [CreateTableSQL]) [CreateTableSQL]
FROM [dbo].[MetadataGenerated] S
JOIN [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] R ON R.SourceSchema = S.TableSchema AND R.SourceTableName = S.TableName
WHERE [SourceSchema]='@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}' AND [SourceTableName]='@{pipeline().parameters.TableName}'

value.value:
@replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(
concat(variables('OutputPath'), if(endswith(variables('OutputPath'), '/'), '', '/'), variables('OutputFileName'), '.parquet')
,'$yyyy$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy'))
,'$MM$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM'))
,'$dd$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd'))
,'$HH$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'HH'))
,'$mm$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'mm'))

query.value:
@replace(
        replace(
                replace(
                    '<fetch mapping="$A$" distinct="true" aggregate="true">
                        <entity name="$B$">
                            <attribute name="$C$" alias="HighWatermark" aggregate="max" />                
                        </entity>
                    </fetch>', 
                    '$A$', pipeline().parameters.task.SourceSchema
                ), 
                '$B$', 
                pipeline().parameters.task.SourceTableName
            ), 
            '$C$',  
            pipeline().parameters.task.WatermarkColumn
            )

value.value:
@if(and(not(empty(pipeline().parameters.task.LowWatermark)), not(contains(pipeline().parameters.task.LowWatermark, 'null'))), 
    replace(
        replace('<filter>
                    <condition attribute="$A$" operator="gt" value="$B$" />
                </filter>', '$A$', pipeline().parameters.task.WatermarkColumn)
    ,'$B$', pipeline().parameters.task.LowWatermark), '')

@replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(
pipeline().parameters.task.RawPath
,'$yyyy$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'yyyy'))
,'$MM$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'MM'))
,'$dd$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd'))
,'$HH$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'HH'))
,'$mm$', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'mm'))
,'$guid$', guid())

@replace(
    replace(
        replace(
            replace('<fetch mapping="$A$"> 
                        <entity name="$B$"> 
                            $C$
                            $D$ 
                        </entity>
                    </fetch>', 
            '$A$', 
            pipeline().parameters.task.SourceSchema
            ),
        '$B$',
        pipeline().parameters.task.SourceTableName), 
    '$C$', if(not(empty(pipeline().parameters.task.SourceQuery)), pipeline().parameters.task.SourceQuery, '<all-attributes /> ')), 
'$D$', if(not(empty(variables('QueryClause'))), variables('QueryClause'), ''))

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@replace(replace(replace(
'SELECT COALESCE($PLW$, MIN([$WC$])) [LowWatermark],  MAX([$WC$]) [HighWatermark] FROM ($Q$) T'
,'$PLW$', if(empty(pipeline().parameters.task.LowWatermark), 'NULL', concat('''', pipeline().parameters.task.LowWatermark, '''')))
,'$WC$', variables('WatermarkColumn'))
,'$Q$', variables('BaseQuery'))

preCopyScript.value: BEGIN TRY EXEC('TRUNCATE TABLE [@{pipeline().parameters.task.SourceSchema}].[@{pipeline().parameters.task.SourceTableName}]') END TRY BEGIN CATCH END CATCH

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA,TABLE_NAME,COLUMN_NAME,ORDINAL_POSITION,IS_NULLABLE,DATA_TYPE,CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH,NUMERIC_PRECISION,NUMERIC_SCALE FROM information_schema.columns (NOLOCK) WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableName}' and TABLE_SCHEMA = '@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}'

UPDATE [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] SET [SourceMetaData]= '@{activity('fetch-source-metadata').output.value}' WHERE  [SourceTableName] = '@{pipeline().parameters.TableName}'  
AND [SourceSchema] = '@{pipeline().parameters.SchemaName}' SELECT 1 A

SELECT [SourceID]
,[SystemCode]
,[SourceSchema]
,[SourceTableName]
,[SourceKeyVaultSecret]
FROM [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest]
WHERE
SourceHandler = 'sql-load'
AND SystemCode = '@{pipeline().parameters.SystemCode}'

UPDATE R
SET [SourceQuery] = S.[SelectSQL]
FROM [dbo].[MetadataGenerated] S
JOIN [dbo].[ExtractLoadManifest] R ON R.[SourceSchema] = S.[TableSchema] AND R.[SourceTableName] = S.[TableName]
WHERE [SourceSchema]='@{item().SourceSchema}' AND [SourceTableName]='@{item().SourceTableName}';
SELECT 1 A
